titleStmt.title: Terms of accomodation, between those of the Episcopall, and their brethren of the Presbyterian perswasions supposed to be consistent with the declared principles of the most moderate of both parties, and humbly presented to the consideration of His Majesty, and both Houses of Parliament / by a countrey minister, a friend to Bath ...
titleStmt.author: Countrey minister.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
